Texts.Eng: Ascend to the heavens of the Sky Boulevard.

Texts.Chs: 这张地图可以让我通往天路，那是翼族最伟大的圣地之一。在进入之前，我得好好准备准备。
Texts.Eng: The map gives me directions to one of the greatest Avian sacred sites, the Sky Boulevard. I ought to be extremely well-prepared before attempting any tomb raiding.

Texts.Chs: 我无法相信我眼前的这一切！这里是多么的宏伟！我应该好好探索探索。
Texts.Eng: The view from up here is grandiose and inspiring! Did I manage to discover all the secrets this place holds?
